title: Linux Kernel 6.1 is Now Approved as an LTS Version
description: Linux Kernel 6.1 was due for approval for more than a month as the last LTS version of 2022. Now, that's a green light!

title: GNOME is (kind of) Bringing Back a Feature It Had Removed a Few Years Ago
description: GNOME design changes makes sense, as it brings back (sort of) a similar functionality that it removed earlier.
